thread.section_title: Phoenix Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great find
thread.title_full: Great find - Review of Phoenix Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Jon M
title: Great find
text:
Review for ground floor room 14. Â£69.
Pros:
- Near Bayswater tube station.
- Close to a goid range of resturants.
- Friendly/professional staff.
- Good bed.
- Super shower.
- Fast internet.
- Very good continental breakfast.
Cons:
- Ground floor- some traffic noise, wheeled suitcases rumbling outside at 5am.
-Dated furniture.
- Room small but like 99% of guests we were hardly in it!
Overall - 100% recommended. Good value for money. Many thanks to the staff.
